1.title: Taken for a ride
1.plot: Vaibhavi falls prey to a techno-savvy cab driver's evil trap while on way to the airport in his car. Will Vaibhavi be able to teach the taxi driver a lesson?

2.title: Revenge against the boss
2.plot: Vijay gets caught trying to get physical with Pinky in the office. Later, he seeks Pinky's help to take revenge against their boss, Kajal for firing them.

3.title: Greed leads to murder
3.plot: Shashi uses multiple sim cards and fake bank accounts to scam e-commerce companies. Later, his greed leads him to commit not one, but two murders. Will he be brought to justice?

4.title: Mouseen pays the price
4.plot: Mouseen flaunts his friend's expensive cars in his locality. Little did he know that his seemingly futile actions will lead to an organized kidnapping and the death of his beloved.

5.title: Ujjaini's tragic end
5.plot: Ujjaini's charred body is found in an abandoned fort. Did her complicated love life lead to her tragic end, or was it her jealous colleague who killed her to cut the competition? Find out the truth as the police investigate the case.

6.title: Predator becomes the prey
6.plot: A fraudster uses the social media and dating apps to cheat women. However, the predator becomes the prey and soon realizes that he is caught in a vicious trap.

7.title: Ragini, Sunju's twisted story
7.plot: The police are puzzled as they try to solve the missing case of lovers, Ragini and Sanju. Sanju's family members claim that Ragini's family members are the convicts. Is it true?

8.title: Anything for money
8.plot: Sakshi and Rishabh, who are desperate to earn quick money, come in contact with Jugunu. They end up being a part of his criminal path which leads to the murder of an innocent.

9.title: Hatred never dies
9.plot: Mahesh loses his son in an accident at home and holds Rahul's mother responsible for this. Mahesh waits for 17 long years and comes up with a diabolic plan to avenge his son's death.

10.title: Lust and deception
10.plot: Pappu with the help of his friend traps an innocent Aditya in his lustful trap, exploits him and fulfills his pleasures. Can Aditya free himself from this dreadful mess?

11.title: Manoj, a doomed soul
11.plot: Manoj finds solace in his adulterous wife's company after his ex-wife makes his life a living hell. Later, he gets severely burnt in a house fire. Was the unfortunate event an accident or a well-planned plot?

12.title: An innocent falls prey to crime
12.plot: Sakshi, a divorced, independent woman falls prey to a vicious crime syndicate and gets robbed of a huge sum of money. Witness the evil yet ingenious tactics used by the miscreants to lead her astray.

13.title: Extremes of child labour
13.plot: Shamsuddin seeks labor from poor children and overburdens them with work. One of Shamsuddin's worker, Neeraj's severed body part is recovered near a railway track. Who is responsible for the murder?

14.title: A sinister power monger
14.plot: Malathi loses her son in a bomb explosion at her home and later somebody tries to poison her husband to death. The police suspect her daughter-in-law, her ex-lover and Malathi's colleague. But, who is the real culprit?

15.title: A complicated case
15.plot: Sarita's brother-in-law, Kishan wants to usurp her house. Her daughter, Nidhi loves Deepak, a married man. Sarita is against Nidhi marrying him. Later, the police find Sarita's dead body. Who killed her?

16.title: Jealousy incites crime
16.plot: Mukesh likes Sonia whom he met on a social networking site. But, his best friend, Ravi manages to impress Sonia. Out of jealousy, Mukesh does the unthinkable unaware of Sonia's true identity.

17.title: Trouble with the debtor
17.plot: Piyush's loan seeking habit leads his family to a dire situation when the loan shark, Hiten threatens to kill them at gunpoint. Will Piyush be able to save his family?

18.title: A fatal obsession
18.plot: Dushyanth is obsessed with Anjali. Despite her efforts to distance herself from him, Dushyanth tracks her whereabouts using social websites and stalks her. He later abducts Anjali and tries to kill her.

19.title: A case of double kidnapping
19.plot: Neeraj seeks revenge on his father and wants to make some fast bucks. He plans with Akhilesh and Srikanth to abduct his brother. However, this plan paves the way for some unexpected situations.

20.title: Adultery costs dear
20.plot: Rukma's children, Munna and Badki are brutally murdered. The police suspect the village's head and Badki's boyfriend. Rukma confesses to having an extramarital affair with a married man, Puru.

21.title: When suspicion sets in
21.plot: Neelima suspects her husband, Naveen of having an affair with Richa. Sudheer also suspects that his wife, Richa is having an affair with Naveen. Soon, Naveen is shot dead. Did Neelima or Sudheer kill Naveen?

22.title: New age fraudsters
22.plot: Witness the technical prowess of fraudsters as they steal Lakhs of rupees from innocent people using an ATM card skimmer. Can the police nab these criminals?

23.title: A twisted tale of romance
23.plot: Shreya, a young girl from a conservative family, is found burnt alive in her house after she finds out that her partner was cheating on her. Is it a suicide or another brutal case of honor killing?

24.title: A notorious husband
24.plot: Gowtam, a blacklisted doctor, blackmails women using their private video clips. His victims try to warn Swati after they learn that she is his next target. What will Swati do now?

25.title: Fighting the women traffickers
25.plot: Manjot lands into trouble after she decides to investigate a man traveling with a group of scared girls on a train. Witness how she uses the social media to expose the vicious women trafficking racket.

26.title: Race to catch the kidnappers
26.plot: Bablu and Mamta work as on stage dancers for a cheap orchestra. Their dream to become famous comes to an abrupt end when they are abducted and tortured by an evil criminal. Can the police catch their kidnapper in time?

27.title: A countdown of murders
27.plot: After the demise of his father and brother, Nanu, a vicious criminal, sets out to kill the twenty-five people on his death list. Will the cold-blooded murderer be stopped in time?

28.title: A desperate lover
28.plot: Ritesh stalks Meenal after he befriends her through a mutual contact. To convince her to marry him, he holds Meenal and her parents at gunpoint in their house. Will the police be able to nab him in time?

29.title: A haunted hostel for girls
29.plot: Girls are made to believe that their hostel is haunted and that they might get molested by some supernatural entity. What's the truth behind these paranormal activities?

30.title: An innocent criminal
30.plot: Satinder, a male nurse, goes on a killing spree by targeting some families and stealing money from their houses. But how far will he go?

31.title: The gunny bag murder
31.plot: Trisha, a bank employee, gets involved in some unhealthy relationships which lead to her murder. Who is her killer?

32.title: The past catches up
32.plot: A married man takes a drastic step to hide his past adulterous relationship with a woman. Where will his actions lead him?

33.title: A godman's unholy deeds
33.plot: After falling for Pratap, Kamini seeks the help of a god-man to kill Rama, his wife. Things turn ugly when a dead body is found in Pratap's flat. Who is the victim?

34.title: A taxi driver's victimisation
34.plot: Three students fake a kidnap and make a cab driver, Vijay steals money for their drugs. The police assume that Vijay is running away from some crimes he committed. Will Vijay's honesty save him?

35.title: Perils of adultery
35.plot: After an affair with Reema, Ashok makes her undergo an illegal abortion with Shilpa's help. Shilpa blackmails Ashok. Later, Ashok's daughter is abducted and is found dead. Who killed her?

36.title: A back-stabbing friend
36.plot: Deepika goes against Kanchan and supports Ridhima. After this, Ridhima comes up with a diabolic plan to use Deepika and get her boyfriend who is arrested on rape charges, out from the police custody.

37.title: Devil in a groom's disguise
37.plot: Abhishek swindles women belonging to affluent families. He cheats a chief transport officer's family and steals the official letterheads from their house. Later, he uses them for his evil motives.

38.title: An epic crime of lust
38.plot: Babita's husband, Aman has an extramarital affair with Maya, a married woman. When Babita pesters Maya to leave Aman, she and Aman try to poison Babitha and her daughter to death.

39.title: A message from the killer
39.plot: A renowned dental college witnesses a brutal murder with a cryptic message from the killer. However, the investigation takes a horrid turn when the prime suspect turns into a victim.

40.title: Side-effects of business rivalry
40.plot: Ayush co-owns a restaurant with Sabi. Their rival Pradhyuman Pandey spoils their restaurant's prosperous business using social media. Later, Sabi is found murdered. Is Pradhyuman Pandey her killer?

41.title: Immoral spouse brought to task
41.plot: Sujit, in an inebriated state, tries to molest a teenager. When she protests, he pushes her off a building. His wife learns that Sujit is targeting his next victim. Can she get him arrested?

42.title: Evil game of accusations
42.plot: Abhay, a senior police official, asks his brother-in-law to escort his wife to his house. Later, when fingers are pointed at the brother-in-law for her murder, an unexpected truth comes to light. Who is the actual culprit?

43.title: A psychotic girlfriend
43.plot: Puneet tries to avoid his psychotic girlfriend, Gurinder as he is unable to handle her madness. Gurinder grows furious and kills Puneet and his family members.

44.title: A group of thieving children
44.plot: Pinky and Dutta buy children from their parents and use them to commit robberies. One of their trainees, Chotu gets caught. His brother, Ballu assaults Dutta blaming him for Chotu's disappearance. Pinky tries to shoot Ballu.

45.title: A case of deception, murder
45.plot: Mithilesh goes missing. Lallan and Raghav become prime suspects as they both had threatened to kill him. Meanwhile, the police find a decomposed body along with a sack of banned currency notes. Is Mithilesh dead?

46.title: Treacherous intentions
46.plot: Janaki offers the job of Secret Service officers to Ajay, Atul, Rahul, and Satish who aspire to work for a crime branch. But little do they know that Janaki is actually a con artist who is using the facade of the job to rob the rich.

63.title: Jealousy Incites Crime Again
63.plot: A jealous Payal defames her co-sister, Mansi. When Mansi tries to expose Payal's misdeed, she does the unthinkable.

64.title: Seeking Thrill Gone Amiss
64.plot: Pradeep, a racing enthusiast ends up committing a heinous crime to buy a sports bike. However, his misdeed doesn't end at this.

65.title: A Mentally Unstable Sibling
65.plot: Banwari is unable to cope up with his brother's demise. The situation spirals out of control when he commits a crime due to his baseless suspicion.

66.title: Girl Orphanage Horror Story
66.plot: With the help of the police and a reporter, a girl uncovers the crimes that happen in a girl's orphanage and brings the criminals to justice.

67.title: An Evil Brother-in-law
67.plot: Shekar makes his sisters-in-law fall prey to his evil trap and exploits them for his mean gains. His wife takes a drastic step after she learns about the same.

68.title: Is Old Age a Curse?
68.plot: After her mother-in-law is diagnosed with Alzheimer's, Vani gets rid of her to achieve her selfish motives. Will her villainy get exposed?

69.title: Victimising the Helpless
69.plot: A sarpanch and his aide exploit the women of their village who are forced to opt for open defecation. They make them fall prey to their lustful trap.

70.title: A Phishing Attack
70.plot: A girl is forced to join her boyfriend's group of fraudsters involved in phishing activities, which results in the death of a businessman. Will they be brought to justice?

71.title: The Age of Innocence
71.plot: Influenced by her friends, Menaka consumes alcohol and lands herself in trouble. Later, Vineet and his friend murder Meneka when they learn about her pregnancy. Will they be punished?

72.title: On a Killing Spree
72.plot: A woman kills her husband owing to his infertility issues. After her brother-in-law turns down her advances, the widow commits a series of crimes.

73.title: Greed Paves Way for Betrayal
73.plot: A businessman takes advantage of his wife and another woman for monetary gains and deceives both of them. Will his misdeeds get exposed?

74.title: A Backstabbing Aunt
74.plot: Renu suspects her niece, Shyamili of having an affair with her husband. She comes up with a sinister plan to dishonor her. Will Renu get caught?

75.title: Anything for Money!
75.plot: Mohit's cousin and her husband execute their diabolic plan to get rid of him and grab all his insurance money.

76.title: Rejection a Motive to Kill?
76.plot: Ridhi's brother, Kamal insults Sanjay when he compels Ridhi to marry him. Sanjay uses his sister, Simmi to trap Kamal and finishes him off.

77.title: Keeping Secrets from Spouse
77.plot: Abhishek keeps his condition of impotency a secret from his wife. His friend uses this situation and creates suspicion in their minds, leading to mayhem.

78.title: Mother's Hand in Committing Crime
78.plot: Shilpa threatens to get her husband, Himanshu arrested for cheating on her. Himanshu commits a series of crimes with his mother's help to protect himself.

79.title: A Lone Warrior
79.plot: Gajju ill-treats the women of his area. Kiran, who is home on vacation, stands up against Gajju and his ilk during the festival of Goddess Durga.

80.title: Bride Vs. Dowry Harassment
80.plot: Newly married Rashmi is tortured by her in-laws for dowry. She wisely creates situations which compel her in-laws to confess their crimes.

81.title: A Mother's Vengeance
81.plot: In a bid to take revenge on her mother, Somesh abducts Amisha. Her mother, an average doctor retaliates by rescuing her.

82.title: A Wicked Neighbor
82.plot: A senior citizen becomes a victim of chain snatching, unaware that her neighbor is involved in it. She gets into trouble when she tries to expose the culprit.

83.title: The Unfaithful Wife
83.plot: A lady gets involved in a love affair with her husband's best friend. She plans to get rid of her husband as she and her lover struggle to legitimize their bond.

84.title: A Bride's Nightmare
84.plot: Rashmi elopes with Shivraj to start a happy married life. Soon, she finds out the cruel reality of her loved one.

85.title: Money Over the Family
85.plot: Mini fails to conceive in the six years of her marriage due to her husband's infertility. They execute their plan to acquire the property.

86.title: The Criminals Next Door
86.plot: A married woman and her lover are exposed after a homicide but what arises during the investigation is unmistakably twisted.

87.title: A Deadly Superstition
87.plot: Jyoti is accused of being bad luck and attracting evil spirits by her mother-in-law. One morning, the entire family is found dead. Who is behind this massacre?

88.title: Misusing Triple Talaaq
88.plot: Salim divorces his wife and brutally kills her. He gets married again. 8 years later, he faces the consequences for his misdeeds.

89.title: Dowry a Social Menace
89.plot: Karan comes up with a diabolic plan to victimize his wife, sister-in-law and collect money from his father-in-law who refuses to give him any dowry.

90.title: An Evil Mother
90.plot: Kamna uses her son to trap innocent men into marrying her and swindles them. She kills her partners when things go against her favor.

91.title: An Adulterous Wife
91.plot: Shivam gathers proof about Manjari, his sister-in-law's affair. Afraid of getting caught, Manjari kidnaps and tortures him for the evidence.

92.title: Lust and Obsession
92.plot: Chand, a lecherous man, is obsessed with Sumitra. When she spurns his advances, he abducts her and torments her.

93.title: Delivery Boy or Fraudster?
93.plot: A senior citizen, Gupta is accused of killing a delivery boy. However, investigation reveals some disturbing truth about the delivery boy and his brother.

94.title: True Issues Cost Dear
94.plot: Neha suspects her husband of having an affair and hires a detective to clarify her doubts. However, her mistrust lands her in deep trouble thanks to the detective.

95.title: A Greedy Sister-in-law
95.plot: Rinku commits a heinous crime to ensure that her sister-in-law and the sole breadwinner of the family marries her brother, Bablu.

96.title: Beware of this Stepdad
96.plot: Kirti refuses to accept her step-father, Pankaj and tries to find her real father, unaware that Pankaj had killed him. But, this move costs Kirti dearly.

97.title: Superstition Leads to Crime
97.plot: A man starts to hallucinate after a tantrik tells him that an evil spirit has resolved to ruin his life. Later, his family bears the brunt of his unthinkable actions.

98.title: Evil Facets of the Cyber World
98.plot:

99.title: Lust Takes a New Turn
99.plot: Asha lands into deep trouble after she gets married to her elder sister's husband, Raghu. Can Asha be able to rescue herself?

100.title: A Wicked Father-in-law
100.plot: Ram Karan traps Kirti into marrying his mentally unstable son and tries to exploit her to fulfill his pleasures.

101.title: Trapped Into Marriage
101.plot: Rajkishore faces an unthinkable situation when a family member cooks up an evil plan to force him into marriage, against his will.

102.title: Femme Fatale on the Prowl
102.plot: Meena makes Suraj and his brother fall prey to her lustful trap. She collects ransom after holding them captive and later gets them killed.

103.title: Discounts Cost Dearly
103.plot: A couple purchases a heavily discounted used vehicle. Later, they find themselves questioning their actions as they get trapped in a murderous plot.

105.title: When Avarice Becomes the Motive
105.plot: Raj secretly records intimate moments of couples and sells the videos for money. He even exploits his wife. Will there be an end to his villainy?

106.title: A Wicked Teacher
106.plot: Lalit exploits his student, Mausami. Things turn awful when Lalit tries to get rid of Mausami on finding out that she is pregnant.

115.title: Conning a common man
115.plot: A couple's dream of buying their own house turns into their worst nightmare when they get swindled while trying to purchase the property.

116.title: The fight for justice
116.plot: A mother could not believe that her son, Hameed died because of taking a selfie and sets out to fight for justice.

117.title: Evil ploy gone amiss
117.plot: Akshath claims that his father's spirit killed his mother. However, the police uncover a shocking truth about his parents in their investigation.

118.title: Miseries of a tormented wife
118.plot: Param comes up with an evil plan to torture his pregnant wife, Parul. However, she musters the courage to fight back in order to save her unborn child.

119.title: One man, multiple wives
119.plot: Despite having multiple wives, a 70-year-old, Jamal Khan trick innocent girls into marriage. Later, his misdeeds pave the way to a horrific end.

120.title: The evil broker
120.plot: Roopa, a marriage broker assures Jamana Das to get hitched to a married woman, Madhuri. Things turn out to be brutal when Roopa commits heinous crimes to achieve this.

121.title: Greed Breaks All Rules
121.plot:

122.title: Risks of being incredulous
122.plot: On the pretext of helping Mukesh elope with Palki, Manoj traps her parents with a fake saint's assistance. Later, Manoj tries to rob Palki's family.

123.title: The haunted mansion
123.plot: A few people from Changoli believe that a witch stays in the old mansion and preys on young girls. Things become intense when Praggya and Arushi move into the haunted mansion. This is the first part of a two-part episode.

124.title: Exploiting superstitious beliefs
124.plot: Dheeraj misleads the villagers that the mansion is haunted and abducts young girls to run a prostitution business in it. Will he be brought to task? This is the second part of a two-part episode.

151.title: A Masked Criminal
151.plot: Highly impressed by the concept of a masked vigilante, a young boy dresses up in a superhero costume, but only to commit heinous crimes.

169.title: Hospital staff's extreme blackmailing
169.plot: Sundar mercilessly molests Chinmayi and tries to frame a doctor, who was earlier infatuated with her. But when Chinmayi slips into a coma, will Sundar ever get exposed?
